programme.title: Out of the Cage - Owen Carr
programme.sub-title: Out of the Cage - Owen Carr
programme.desc: Owen Carr has been involved in MMA for over 25 years, after being introduced to the sport at a very young age. He has learned persistence and has a strong belief in staying true to himself. He consistantly trains with 30 guys on the mat, and feels he is always well prepared. Today he shares some endurance tips that help him pace himself and stay focused in his matches.

programme.title: Out of the Cage - Jeremy Perdue

programme.title: After The Fight - Chad Anheliger
programme.sub-title: After The Fight - Chad Anheliger
programme.desc: Chad Anheliger is well rounded in most fight sports but has been having issues with hip flexibility and a long-term shoulder injury. After some time with Sports Conditioning coach Marie Michalski, he learns valuable skills to make him a stronger fighter.
